content.html: NEW: Government ministers are using technology that auto deletes their WhatsApp messages after posting. It’s raised fears transparency rules which demand relevant policy messages are stored (and are FOIable) are being circumvented. telegraph.co.uk/politics/2023/…
content.value:
NEW: Government ministers are using technology that auto deletes their WhatsApp messages after posting. 

It’s raised fears transparency rules which demand relevant policy messages are stored (and are FOIable) are being circumvented.
telegraph.co.uk/politics/2023/…

content.html: Absolutely wild security posture by the best and brightest minds in Government. Not "let's not use WhatsApp", but "let's delete the messages, I'm sure that's safe."
